price: 27. qui violent le pacte d’Allah après l’avoir conclu, rompent les liens qu’Allah a ordonné de maintenir et répandent la corruption sur terre. Ceux-là sont bien les perdants.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَنقُضُونَ عَهۡدَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مِيثَٰقِهِۦ وَيَقۡطَعُونَ مَآ أَمَرَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦٓ أَن يُوصَلَ وَيُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yanquḍūna ʿahda al-lahi min baʿdi mīthāqihi wayaqṭaʿūna mā amara al-lahu bihi an yūṣala wayuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi ulāika humu al-khāsirūna
